body:
Comment 3 by **trolleriprofessorn**: 
I would never have figured out what "command" to use from reading
the current godoc documentation:

-sync="command"
	if this and -sync_minutes are set, run the argument as a
	command every sync_minutes; it is intended to update the
	repository holding the source files.

Also, there is nothing to indicate to the user of the web pages
that a refresh is available. I like the solution used by GoPkgDoc.
It has better discoverability. At the bottom of a package page,
you find the following message:

  GoPkgDoc generated this page from the XXX source code just now. ‚ü≤

On mouse-over, the circular arrow shows the message

  "Refresh this page from the source"
  
Would it be possible to offer something similar?
